name: scale-18
desc: Rescale a fixed point number of N decimals to 18 decimals where N is in the operand.

operand.name: decimals
operand.desc: Decimals of the value being rescaled.

operand.name: saturate
operand.desc: If 1 scaling up will saturate rather than overflow past uint256 max.

operand.name: round-up
operand.desc: If 1 scaling down will round up rather than down on precision loss.
